ya10.3.6:1.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahissatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:2.1_0: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ pajahissati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:3.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:4.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:5.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:6.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:7.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:8.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti? No. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:9.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:10.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:11.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:13.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:15.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:16.1_2: Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca pajahittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:17.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:18.1_2: Dve puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti domanassindriyañca pajahittha. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:19.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:20.1_2: Pañca puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha aññindriyañca bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:22.1_0: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṁ bhāvessanti no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha.
ya10.3.6:22.1_1: Pañca puggalā aññindriyañca bhāvessanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha.
ya10.3.6:23.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:24.1_2: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:25.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:26.1_2: Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha.
ya10.3.6:27.1_0: Yo aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:28.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:29.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissatīti?
ya10.3.6:30.1_2: Cattāro puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti.
ya10.3.6:31.1_0: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:32.1_2: Cattāro puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.6:33.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:34.1_0: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha,
ya10.3.6:34.1_2: Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:35.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:36.1_2: Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.6:37.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:38.1_2: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:39.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:40.1_2: Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.6:41.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:42.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:43.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:44.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:45.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:46.1_0: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha,
ya10.3.6:46.1_2: Cha puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:47.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:48.1_2: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.6:49.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:50.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyañca nappajahittha aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:51.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:52.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.6:53.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:54.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyañca nappajahittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:55.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:56.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:57.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:58.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:59.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:60.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.6:61.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:62.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:63.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:64.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.6:65.1_0: Yo aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:66.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca na bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:67.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:68.1_2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
